Description:
Detects both of CVE-2022-30190 (Follina) and DogWalk vulnerabilities exploiting msdt.exe binary to load the "sdiageng.dll" library

Author: Greg (rule)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Diagnostic Library Sdiageng.DLL Loaded By Msdt.EXE
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\msdt.exe' and image_loaded like '%\sdiageng.dll'
